text: Mr. Chips is the central character in the 1934 novella Goodbye, Mr. Chips and its adaptations. Mr. Chips may also refer to: *Mr. Chips (album), a 1984 album by Hank Crawford *Mr Chips, the mascot of the game show Catchphrase ==See also== *Goodbye, Mr. Chips (disambiguation)
title: Mr. Chips (disambiguation)
